channel.title: Sponsed Server Help
channel.description:
Hello all.
1)
I'm thinking of sponsoring my server. But before I do so, I don't want to bid like $300 to get first place when I only really need to big like $100 to get into the top 5. Could somebody please tell me how much the average server goes for?
2)
Do I have too stop selling staff members if I add it on the sponsored server listings?
3)
Can I big like $50 and be sure to be placed at least in the top 10?
Thanks Loved.

item.title: Sponsed Server Help
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

  1. $30 is lowest, lots of people bid around $100 and don’t really get in top 10.

  2. You shouldn’t be selling staff positions in the first place (and yes, you do have to stop).

  3. Depends

Read full topic

item.title: Sponsed Server Help
item.dc:creator: @loved loved
item.description:
@loved wrote:

[quote=“TOMSCAPE BETA, post:2, topic:326055”][quote author=loved link=topic=422471.msg3101248#msg3101248 date=1263724904]
Hello all.

I’m thinking of sponsoring my server. But before I do so, I don’t want to bid like $300 to get first place when I only really need to big like $100 to get into the top 5. Could somebody please tell me how much the average server goes for?

Do I have too stop selling staff members if I add it on the sponsored server listings?

Can I big like $50 and be sure to be placed at least in the top 10?

Thanks Loved.
[/quote]

  1. There is no average, people bid.

  2. Yes

  3. not sure, depends how much people bid.[/quote]

But isn’t their like an average amount or something?

Read full topic
